message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that $90 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $82. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $75, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that $75 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make a bit of a compromise. I can offer it to you for $79. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $76, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that $76 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $78. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. I'm willing to go up to $74, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that $74 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $77. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. I'm not willing to go any higher than $74. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I think I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
